mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN state IN ('CHARGE', 'PAY') THEN count WHEN state IN ('CAR', 'TAXI') THEN -count ELSE 0 END) AS total_credit FROM member_credit WHERE member_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_credit(MEMBER_CREDIT_ID, count, state, transaction_date, member_id) VALUES (member_credit_seq.NEXTVAL, 7, 'CAR', LOCALTIMESTAMP, #{userId})
